text: Sini (Sìni) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 30 September 2018, 523 people lived there. Its area is 8.75 km². It is 255 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano
title: Sini, Sardinia
